About me

I am a recent Software Engineering graduate with hands-on experience in various technologies and frameworks, including Java, Python, JavaScript, Django, and React. I am passionate about continuous learning and thrive in overcoming challenging situations

In addition to my technical skills, I enjoy traveling for work and am always eager to experience new environments and cultures. I'm an avid sports enthusiast and believe that staying active helps me maintain a balanced and focused mindset. I am highly organized and hardworking, consistently striving to improve my skills and achieve my goals.

For my Bachelor’s thesis project, I developed an Android app using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. The app focuses on stimulating children’s development through interactive and educational activities.

Tarot API

The API REST is formed by 4 resources that allow us to make a card spread with both traditional tarot cards and your own customized cards, as well as playing some games with them.Develop using Java.

Decide

The objective of this project is to implement a secure electronic voting platform that meets a series of basic guarantees, such as anonymity and the secrecy of the vote.It was a group project for a subject in which we implemented new funcionalities as well as tests.
